name: Orange feedly
description:
Tested only with Firefox21 & Stylish in Windows.

A low-effort attempt to add some color and contrast to feedly cloud's webview. The colors can be changed from first lines. Hopefully works with other users too :D
additional_info:
v0.2
- blue underlined links in articles (an acquired taste)
- condensed and better aligned feed listing
- padding for theme, options pages etc. so they don't touch feed list's scrollbar
- black 1px border for opened items

v0.1
- everything
